Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Evaluador acreditado Consejo Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnología, CONACYT Mexico. Realizar con objetividad y efectividad la evaluación técnica de las propuestas y proyectos de investigación científica, desarrollo e innovación tecnológica y formación de recursos humanos, presentados ante los Fondos de Investigación y Programas del CONACYT
Responsabile dal progetto di ricerca: Estancias Posdoctorales y Sabaticas al Extranjero para la Consolidación de Grupos de Investigación. CONACYT Mexico.

Riconosciuto Membro Sistema Nazionale della Ricerca Messicano, livello I. CONACYT Mexico. Informazione: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sistema_Nacional_de_Investigadores Sistema Nacional de Investigadores (National System of Researchers) or SNI is a governmental agency established in Mexico in 1984, to promote both the quantity and quality of research in Mexico, especially in the sciences. In the 1980s, the country suffered from “brain drain,” with talent leaving Mexico for better economic opportunities in other places in the world. SNI first worked to establish compensation guides to keep researchers in the country, but since has also been involved in the reform of Mexico’s graduate-level education. Membership in the system is prestigious, which require demonstration of significant contributions in research as well as teaching and the promotion of research in Mexico. Evaluation of members and potential members mostly relies on their academic credentials and production but also includes other factors such as the creation of programs and projects. To become and remain a member of the SNI, researchers must show a history of systematic research in their fields, done as part of their employment with a university or research institution and duly documented.
“Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale”, tornata 2016–2018 – I quadrimestre, abilitato per il settore 13/A2-Politica Economica – II Fascia (validità 07/04/2017 – 07/04/2023).

Vi prego di considerare il mio CV in allegato, consapevole delle sanzioni previste dal codice penale, e dalle leggi speciali nei confronti di chiunque rilasci dichiarazioni mendaci, consapevole altresì della possibilità di decadere dai benefici conseguenti a eventualli provvedimenti emanati sulla base di dichiarazione non veritiera dichiaro: - che quanto dichiarato nella domanda e nel curriculum vitae corrsiponde a verità – art. 46, D.P.R. 445/2000; - che le copie di documenti, titoli e pubblicazioni allegati alla presente domanda sono conformi agli originali –art. 47, D.P.R. 445/2000. In fede, Edgar Javier Sanchez Carrera

Riconosciuto Membro Sistema Nazionale della Ricerca Messicano, livello I. CONACYT Mexico. The Sistema Nacional de Investigadores (National System of Researchers) is a governmental agency which promotes and evaluates professional research activity in Mexico. Its objective is to promote and strengthen the quantity and quality of research in Mexico through the evaluation of the work done. Evaluation of members and potential members mostly relies on their academic credentials and production but also includes other factors such as the creation of programs and projects.[3] To become and remain a member of the SNI, researchers must show a history of systematic research in their fields, done as part of their employment with a university or research institution and duly documented. At least twenty hours per week must be spent in research if in Mexico or work must be completely research related if abroad. Researchers are evaluated through the publication of articles, books, research results and book chapters as well as patents, technological innovations and technology transfer, if applicable. Other areas for evaluation include the direction of professional and post-graduate theses, the teaching of undergraduate and graduate courses and the formation of new researchers and research groups. More info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sistema_Nacional_de_Investigadores

Partecipazione PRIN: PROGETTI DI RICERCA DI RILEVANTE INTERESSE NAZIONALE – Bando 2017. Research project title: Technological change and development: the complex relationships among innovation, finance, labour and trade.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Maggio-Giugno 2006, ho collaborato con la scuola di Economia e Management dell’Universita’ Libera di Bolzano, nel progetto di ricerca “Dynamical Regimes in Economics: modeling and statistical tools”. Responsabile del progetto: Prof. Juan Gabriel Brida.
